CHAT.comment: Home Visit 4; Mot and Chi sitting on couch with book between them
Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi follows words with finger; reading seems to require a lot of effort to Chi but she was not exclusively a slave of the print: she comments on the faces on the moon and sun , and says she's hungry too; Mot helps to sound out words , suggests how to break up words like started; the most interesting thing about this reading is certainly that it still contains talk about the story

u.a: covers part of word with her finger
covers the i with her finger
